item.title: Tidyverse: Getting Your Feet Wet
item.description:
Workflow Resources Up Front tibbles %>% Sample Data “Tidy” Data {dplyr} select() columns ggplot() Exercise 1 filter() Rows ggplot() Exercise 2 mutate() Columns ggplot() Exercise 3 arrange() Rows group_by() for Grouped Data ggplot() Exercise 4 summarize() ggplot() Exercise 5 Reflection Image credit to R Memes for Statistical Fiends
I recently had the opportunity to teach some tidyverse code to colleagues and classmates in a series of workshops.
